titleStmt.title: A proclamation agaynst the deceyptfull wyndyng and foldynge of wooles
Proclamations. 1562-08-10
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Churchyarde by Rycharde Iugge, and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Proclamation requiring observation of statutes on apparell and the decay of horses.
At foot of sheet: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
